verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the glory of the Lord
rise among us.
Let the glory of the Lord
rise among us.
Let the praises of the King
rise among us; let it rise.
Let the songs of the Lord
rise among us.
Let the songs of the Lord
rise among us.
Let the joy of the King
rise among us; let it rise.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh - oh - oh, let it rise.
Oh - oh - oh, let it rise.

Oh - oh - oh, let it rise.
Oh - oh - oh, let it rise.
